problem.markdown:
>>As you increase the mass of the SDOF system, what happens to the frequency?<<
( ) The frequency increases (x) The frequency decreases ( ) The frequency remains the same
[explanation] As you increase the mass, the frequency or rate of oscillations decreases. More mass causes the system to oscillate more slowly. [explanation]
problem.p: As you increase the mass of the SDOF system, what happens to the frequency?

choicegroup.label: As you increase the mass of the SDOF system, what happens to the frequency?

div.p: As you increase the mass, the frequency or rate of oscillations decreases. More mass causes the system to oscillate more slowly.
